description: Authenticate and provision new tenants with initial document templates. Add and manage templates for existing tenants to standardize workflows. Connect to external services via HTTP as part of your setup or operations.

capabilities.name: add-template
capabilities.description: Add a new template with sections to an existing tenant via the seed-template endpoint

capabilities.name: auth-login
capabilities.description: Authenticate user via the login endpoint and get JWT access token

capabilities.name: create-tenant
capabilities.description: Create a new tenant via the bootstrap endpoint with tenant, service type, admin user, and document sections

capabilities.name: http-request
capabilities.description: Make HTTP requests to external APIs
